text:
🌿Zhenghua Nature Park is located at Segar Rd, opposite Zhenghua Community Club, bounded by Bukit Panjang Ring Rd and the busy Bukit Timah Expressway.
⛳Its inviting Open Lawn is a great place for picnic.
⛹️⛳Kids can run about freely and play ball at the green open lawn.
🛝Nearby is a sand-filled Children Playground designed for kids age 2 to 12 years old.
🏋️Next to it, is a Fitness Corner.
🛖A Pavilion housing the toilet is located nearby, should the kids needs cleaning up.
🪵There are two Shelters located at each end of the Nature Park.
🚴A walking/cycling path wounds around the serene Park where cyclist can cycle around the park.
🚧Zhenghua Nature Park is well connected to Zhenghua Park, Chestnut Nature Park, Dairy Farm Nature Park and nearby Bukit Panjang Park Connectors.

Best of Both worlds: Biggest Happiness 😊❤️😊 Zhenghua PCN and Across BKE is the Observation Tower at Chestnut Nature Park & MTB leads through the Central Catchment area till Mandai Track 15, Mandai Lake.

Our first visit having just moved into the area. We ended up cycling from our house which is close by. 7km round trip with 8yr and 4yr old. Great path for cycling with kids, quite shady too and 2 playgrounds on our route coming from Eco Sanctuary condo area. Large long hidden grass area used by mountain bikers kept the kids entertained for a long time. Great if you're looking for a good walk or cycle and live in the area not necessarily a destination park.

Possible to cycle on the hilly area here but do note that it may result in faster wear and tear of your bicycle (eg. spokes). Be on the lookout for wildlife too so as to avoid running them over (eg. hens, roosters, chicks) or for your own personal safety (eg. occasional snakes). Also, because there have been wild boar encounters, you may want to take some precautions (eg. don't visit from 5pm-8am, make sure your bike isn't squeaky).
A pleasant resting place with a big field for kids running & playing
